helpers

Class Screen

  • java.lang.Object
    • helpers.Screen

  • public class Screen
extends java.lang.Object
    Handles all methods concerning the size of the Screen.
    See Also:

      • percentageToXDimension

        public static double percentageToXDimension(double percentage)
        Converts a percentage into a x dimension. This method is useful for managing screens of different sizes.
        Parameters:
        percentage - Value of which we would like to have the correspondence into x value.
        Returns:
        Value corresponding to the percentage passed in parameter.

      • percentageToYDimension

        public static double percentageToYDimension(double percentage)
        Converts a percentage into a y dimension. This method is useful for managing screens of different sizes.
        Parameters:
        percentage - Value of which we would like to have the correspondence into y value.
        Returns:
        Value corresponding to the percentage passed in parameter.
